title: Zeit Lotus: Season Trend 10/26: Walker/Fetterman, Elon Musk, Mark Meadows, Chik-FIl-A, Amazon, Matthew Perry, Omri Katz
itunes:title: Zeit Lotus: Season Trend 10/26: Walker/Fetterman, Elon Musk, Mark Meadows, Chik-FIl-A, Amazon, Matthew Perry, Omri Katz
description:
In this edition of Zeit Lotus: Season Trend, Jack and Miles discuss the coverage of the Fetterman/Oz "debate", Elon Musk: Chief Twitter Man?, Mark Meadows (maybe) having to testify, Chik-Fil-A piloting a 3-day work week, the Amazon delivery worker mauled to death by dogs, Matthew Perry's obsession with Keanu Reeves, and Omri Katz being high the set of 'Hocus Pocus'?!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
